Detailed Description

Manages the input of a date or time object and is usually used by the classes DateEditor and TimeEditor.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DateTimeInputMapper::DateTimeInputMapper (  BOOLEAN  date_mode = TRUE,
BOOLEAN  highlight_field = FALSE
)  [explicit]
 

Parameters:
date_mode If set to TRUE, the input mapper allows editing a date object, otherwise a time object can be edited.
higlight_field If set to TRUE, the currently edited field is highlighted as input indication.
